intro:
Hi there,
I am Rayhatron, a web developer from Zimbabwe and welcome to my little corner of the world wide web.
heading: About me
description1: My real name is Rufaro Madamombe but i'm know as Rayhatron on the internet. I am a tech enthusiast and passionate web developer who enjoys problem solving and experimenting with new technology. I also like to write about my journery as a web developer, experiences I've had with tech and about the lessons life has taught me.
description2: At the moment, I am mainly a front-end web developer. However, I am constantly increasing my knowledge and I will soon be a full stack web developer. I use the technical skills that I have to provide effective web solutions to a business' needs. In addition to being a web developer, I also help businesses become more visible on the internet through Search Engine Optimization services.
invitation: Feel free to get in touch for web developement collaborations or just a friendly chat via twitter for now.
